Jeff McNeil singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder Dylan Carlson. Brandon Nimmo to 3rd. Starling Marte to 2nd.

Francisco Lindor grounds into a double play, pitcher Miles Mikolas to catcher Willson Contreras to first baseman Paul Goldschmidt. Brandon Nimmo out at home. Starling Marte to 3rd. Jeff McNeil to 2nd. Francisco Lindor out at 1st. 2 outs
